Logic Analysis: Contains the main program execution flow, initializes the UI and connects it with Stopwatch and History modules.
Houses the Stopwatch class with methods for starting, stopping, resetting, and retrieving the elapsed time.
Contains the History class responsible for storing and retrieving timing records to and from a file.
Shared Knowledge: The 'stopwatch.py' and 'history.py' modules will be used by 'main.py' to create the application functionality.
Anything UNCLEAR: The current project requirements and design are clear. We will proceed with the implementation of the Stopwatch and History modules before integrating them into the UI.
